content: Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Just the overall speed of business in the long term, connectivity, relationship building, knowledge sharing, the position that Veeva has as the place where you get together in person, yes, to learn about Veeva, that's one thing, but also to -- oftentimes, we have customers meeting their far-flung teams together in-person at the first time at a Veeva Summit. Your line is open. It's definitely early adopter for Data Cloud and specifically in the area of Compass, the Compass part of Data Cloud because there's been a vendor there -- a company there that sort of set the standard and it's just the way you do it, and that's for literally more than 20 years. Your line is open. Your line is open.
